parameters.name: Collection
parameters.description: The name of the document collection to be deleted.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
Instance ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) API to view details of all AnalyticDB PostgreSQL instances in the target region, including the instance ID.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description:
The name of the namespace. Default value: public.

>  You can call the [CreateNamespace](~~2401495~~) operation to create a namespace and call the [ListNamespaces](~~2401502~~) operation to query a list of namespaces.

parameters.name: NamespacePassword
parameters.description:
Password for the namespace.

> This value is specified by the [CreateNamespace](~~2401495~~) API.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the instance is located.
